titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Archibald Venn, 14. 10. 1941
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Abschrift McGuinness, Kopie in BA. Publiziert (WiC, S. 345).

div.p: I have, after considering the matter for a long time, decided to take on some war-work, & I have accepted a job of “dispensary porter” at Guy’s Hospital, London. I ought therefore, to leave Cambridge at the beginning of next week. Would you be so very kind as to grant me an interview some time this week. I should like to apply for leave of absence.
